# Fragile Harmful

As Fragile, you will die instantly if someone tries to use kill button on you (even if the role can not directly kill)

  • Max
    • Set the Maximum amount of Fragile that can be in a match
  • Spawn Chance
    • Set the percentage players have of getting Fragile
  • Impostors can become Fragile
    • ON: Impostors can become this role
    • OFF: Impostors cannot become this role
  • Crewmates can become Fragile
    • ON: Crewmates can become this role
    • OFF: Crewmates cannot become this role
  • Neutrals can become Fragile
    • ON: Neutrals can become this role
    • OFF: Neutrals cannot become this role
  • Impostors can force kill Fragile
    • ON: Impostors can kill Fragile forcefully
    • OFF: Impostors cannot kill Fragile forcefully
  • Crewmates can force kill Fragile
    • ON: Crewmates can kill Fragile forcefully
    • OFF: Crewmates cannot kill Fragile forcefully
  • Neutrals can force kill Fragile
    • ON: Neutrals can kill Fragile forcefully
    • OFF: Neutrals cannot kill Fragile forcefully
  • Killer lunge on kill
    • ON: Killers will lunge towards the Fragile on kill
    • OFF: Killers will not lunge towards the Fragile on kill

From: cuboidsnow & Coding: ryuk
